snippet: Health and disciplinary authorities are investigating claims published in a Chinese newspaper that Sanofi paid hundreds of doctors to prescribe its products.
lead_paragraph: Health and disciplinary authorities are investigating claims published in a Chinese newspaper that Sanofi paid hundreds of doctors to prescribe its products.

headline.main: Sanofi Being Investigated for Bribery by China
headline.print_headline: Sanofi Being Investigated For Bribery By China
